name: bracket
description: Bracket is a self-hosted note-taking and journaling app optimized for simplicity. Users can keep daily logs, private thoughts, and observations, all stored in markdown and accessible through a clean web interface.
features: Note-Taking: Simple, focused journaling and note-taking. Capture thoughts easily.
Daily Logs: Keep daily journals and personal observations. Document your life.
Markdown Storage: Notes stored in portable markdown format. Future-proof.
Clean Interface: Minimal, distraction-free web UI. Focus on writing.
Private Thoughts: Self-hosted for complete privacy. Your journal, your control.
Search Notes: Find past entries quickly with search. Never lose a thought.
Simple Organization: Easy categorization and tagging. Stay organized.
Self-Hosted: Run on your own server for data ownership. Complete privacy.
